original_text:
And he has shriveled me up,
    which is a witness against me,
and my leanness has risen up against me;
    it testifies to my face.
korean_text: 주께서 나를 시들게 하셨으니 이는 나를 향하여 증거를 삼으심이라 나의 파리한 모습이 일어나서 대면하여 내 앞에서 증언하리이다

sentences.original_text: And he has shriveled me up
which is a witness against me
and my leanness has risen up against me
